attributes.action: re-instate Carol Thatchers job back on `The One Show'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The comment allegedly made by Carol Thatcher was a throw away one made in the Green room and not made on air unlike recent broadcasters that still have their jobs. We are supposed to be living in a `free' country for goodness sake. The world has gone mad!

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
